author: Veronika Kero
title: 6 at-home fitness deals to help keep you active during these weird times
description: Gyms are closed, classes are canceled, and you've quickly found yourself curled up on the couch watching Netflix. Welcome to the first week of quarantine, people. It's easy to lose sight of your regular fitness regime when everything around you seems to be co…
